phase.text: It's top secret and only authorized Secret Weevil Service agents can pass.

userResponse.option: I'm not an SWS agent. How do I become one?

phase.text: The SWS HQ is inside Castle Gam. You should go there now! I have a feeling I'll be seeing you again soon!
Agent, you'd best hurry back to the SWS HQ inside Castle Gam to accept your mission.

userResponse.option: I'm an SWS agent on an important mission! I'm here on Gam's authorization!
You'd better let me pass if you know what's good for you.

phase.text: What are you looking for here? This is a top-secret dig site and the archaeologists don't like visitors.

userResponse.option: I'm looking for a missing Bin Pet. It's been kidnapped!
We've got intelligence that a stolen Bin Pet may have been brought here.

phase.text: Well well well, a little cheeky, aren't you? Who said you could waltz in here?

userResponse.option: I'm a special agent of the SWS, that's all you need to know.
Gam sent me. I've come direct from SWS Headquarters.

phase.text: If you're really Gam's special agent, then what colour is the Bin Pet you're looking for?
All right, I guess you've convinced me. You can go in, but make it quick!
phase.textOnReturn: You again! You just can't stay away, can you.

phase.text: Thought you'd fool me, did you? You'd better run back to HQ and take another look at that report.
